name: Spooky Torch
description:
A top-down shooter game made for Skyoo Community Game Jam 2 and Life Game Jam 2018. 

You have to max out the powerups for the win. But be aware, it is dark and the enemies can come from anywhere.  So, start the game and the spooky torch will carry you towards the win.

There are three difficulty levels so if you find it hard or easy, you can easily adjust.

WASD - Move

Mouse Movement - Aim

Left Click - Shoot
